name: EquipEuropa
goal: Operation as a network of partners and working as an open university system with flexible and pragmatic programmes in European public affairs, following a practice-oriented training concept with modular structure in order to tailor projects for NGOs, institutions, enterprises and individuals from especially within the EU, candidate and neighbourhood countries - especially for young people, economists, lawyers and journalists.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
Fundamental and Human Rights
Minorities
Free movement of persons
European Citizens' Initiative
Internal Market
Regional policy
Environment policy
Consumer protection
Public health
Energy policy
Trans-European Networks
Culture and Education
Western Balkans
EU enlargement
Neighbourhood countries
